descriptions: The date which samples were collected.Converted as date in Rscript.
The name of the property from which the sample was collected. Usually used the same name used by Texas Ecolab but some samples were collected from road side.
Each sample has it's own unique sample_id. Usually started with the abbreviation of the name of the property from where a particular sample is collected and the sequence of the species collected.
Each species has it's own unique species_id. Random number.
Notes took for samples where there was a confusion regarding identifying species or location.
